dsOverview.title: Krishnamurti's Tropical 200mb Wind, summers 1967 and 1972

summary.p: This dataset containins tropical wind analyses at 200 mb from T. N. Krishnamurti of Florida State University. The time for all analyses is 12Z, units are meters/sec, and the data are on a 2.5-degree latitude/longitude grid. The dates covered are 1 June 1967 through 31 August 1967, and 1 June 1972 through 31 August 1972.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: FSU/METEO > Meteorology Department, Florida State University

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Upper Level Winds
